msi2pyexpander.py command line options
======================================

``-h``
++++++

    Show help for command line options.

``--summary``
+++++++++++++

    Show a summary of the program's function.

``-S --substitutionfile``
+++++++++++++++++++++++++

    Specify the SUBSTITUTIONFILE.

``-o FILE --outputfile FILE``
+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++

    Specify the OUTPUTFILE.
